en.title: Living with Kittens and Children | Rules for Safe and Happy Coexistence
en.content:
Living with cats and children can be a wonderful experience for both. Let's establish some safety rules.

Rules to Teach Children

Teach basic rules such as: touch gently (no hitting or pulling), don't pull the tail or ears, let go when the cat shows displeasure, don't wake a sleeping cat, and don't make loud noises.

Choosing the Right Breed

Siberians are one of the breeds that get along well with children. They are calm and patient, and kittens raised in a family environment are accustomed to children's movements. Fuluck Cattery raises kittens in an environment with children, so we can confidently recommend them to families with kids.

zh.title: 小猫与孩子的相处之道 | 安全快乐共处的规则
zh.content:
猫咪和孩子一起生活，对双方来说都是美好的体验。让我们提前制定一些安全规则吧。

教给孩子的规则

教导孩子一些基本规则：轻柔地抚摸（不要打或拉扯）、不要拉尾巴和耳朵、猫咪表示不高兴时要放手、不要叫醒正在睡觉的猫、不要发出大声响。

选择合适的品种

西伯利亚猫是与孩子相处融洽的品种之一。它们性格温和且有耐心，在家庭环境中长大的小猫已经习惯了孩子的动作。福楽猫舍在有孩子的环境中培育小猫，因此我们可以放心地向有小朋友的家庭推荐。
